ROOT.GetTLineTower: SELECT T.ID,A.TOWER_NAME,A.TOWERNO,T.LONGITUDE,T.LATITUDE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TOWER_B T LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tline_r_tower A ON T.ID=A.TOWER_ID WHERE A.TLINE_ID={0} order by A.towerno
ROOT.GetTLineSETower: select l.name,n.line_id,n.tower_id,t.longitude,t.latitude,l.start_st_id,nvl(L1.NAME,nvl(L2.NAME,L3.NAME)) AS line_name,nvl(R1.TOWER_NAME,nvl(R2.TOWERNAME,R3.TOWERNAME)) AS TOWER_NAME from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tline_b l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tnode_b n on l.tnode_id=n.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on n.tower_id=t.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B L1 ON n.line_id=L1.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B L2 ON n.line_id=L2.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TLINE_B L3 ON n.line_id=L3.id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tline_r_tower R1 on n.line_id=R1.tline_id AND n.tower_id=R1.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower R2 on n.line_id=R2.line_id AND n.tower_id=R2.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower R3 on n.line_id=R3.line_id AND n.tower_id=R3.tower_id WHERE l.id={0}
